meanings.definition: A person or thing that is equally favored or preferred.
meanings.sent1: My sister is my cofavorite because we both love playing soccer.
meanings.sent2: The teacher treats all students as cofavorites, giving everyone equal attention.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the cake and the ice cream were cofavorites, disappearing quickly.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the two main characters became cofavorites of the audience, receiving equal applause.
meanings.sent5: The twins were cofavorites of their grandmother, who couldn't choose between them.

meanings.sent1: I cofavorite spending time with my friends and reading books on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She cofavorites both chocolate and vanilla ice cream, so she always gets a mix.
meanings.sent3: The boss cofavorites all team members, making sure everyone gets fair opportunities.
meanings.sent4: The judge seemed to cofavorite both arguments, taking time to consider each one.
meanings.sent5: As a parent, it's important to cofavorite all your children, showing equal love and support.
